words.tran_cn: 贵妇；继承亡夫爵位的遗孀；老年贵妇人

trans.tran_cn: 继承亡夫爵位（或遗产的）遗孀，贵妇
trans.tran_en: a woman from a high social class who has land or a title from her dead husband
